{/**
  * @typedef Props
  * @property {number} num4
  * @property {number} num5
  * @property {number} num3
  * @property {boolean} a
  * @property {boolean} b
  */}

# Main

math: {1 + 2}, {4 - 2}, {4 / 2}, {3 * 2}, {3 % 2}, {4 % 2}

dynamic math: {props.num4 + 2}, {5 + 2}, {props.num4 + props.num5 + props.num3}

boolean operators: {props.a || props.b}, { props.a && props.b}

equality: {props.num4 == 4}, {2 > 2}, {2 < 3}, {2 <= 2}, {2 >= 2}

complex bool: {(props.num4 == 4 && props.num3 != 2 && 1 + 2 + 3 == 6) || false}

complex operator: {10 / 2 * (5 - 2 + 3)}
